00055     template <typename BIDTp_, typename ValTp_>
00056     struct trigger_entry
00057     {
00058         typedef BIDTp_ bid_type;
00059         typedef ValTp_ value_type;
00060 
00061         bid_type bid;
00062         value_type value;
00063 
00064         operator bid_type ()
00065         {
00066             return bid;
00067         }
00068     };
00069 
00070     template <typename BIDTp_, typename ValTp_, typename ValueCmp_>
00071     struct trigger_entry_cmp : public std::binary_function<trigger_entry<BIDTp_, ValTp_>, trigger_entry<BIDTp_, ValTp_>, bool>
00072     {
00073         typedef trigger_entry<BIDTp_, ValTp_> trigger_entry_type;
00074         ValueCmp_ cmp;
00075         trigger_entry_cmp(ValueCmp_ c) : cmp(c) { }
00076         trigger_entry_cmp(const trigger_entry_cmp & a) : cmp(a.cmp) { }
00077         bool operator () (const trigger_entry_type & a, const trigger_entry_type & b) const
00078         {
00079             return cmp(a.value, b.value);
00080         }
00081     };
00082 
00083     template <typename block_type,
00084               typename prefetcher_type,
00085               typename value_cmp>
00086     struct run_cursor2_cmp
00087     {
00088         typedef run_cursor2<block_type, prefetcher_type> cursor_type;
00089         value_cmp cmp;
00090 
00091         run_cursor2_cmp(value_cmp c) : cmp(c) { }
00092         run_cursor2_cmp(const run_cursor2_cmp & a) : cmp(a.cmp) { }
00093         inline bool operator () (const cursor_type & a, const cursor_type & b)
00094         {
00095             if (UNLIKELY(b.empty()))
00096                 return true;
00097             // sentinel emulation
00098             if (UNLIKELY(a.empty()))
00099                 return false;
00100             //sentinel emulation
00101 
00102             return (cmp(a.current(), b.current()));
00103         }
00104     };
00105 
00106     template <typename block_type, typename bid_type>
00107     struct write_completion_handler1
00108     {
00109         block_type * block;
00110         bid_type bid;
00111         request_ptr * req;
00112         void operator () (request * /*completed_req*/)
00113         {
00114             * req = block->read(bid);
00115         }
00116     };
00117 
00118 
00119     template <
00120         typename block_type,
00121         typename run_type,
00122         typename input_bid_iterator,
00123         typename value_cmp>
00124     void
00125     create_runs(
00126         input_bid_iterator it,
00127         run_type ** runs,
00128         int_type nruns,
00129         int_type _m,
00130         value_cmp cmp)
00131     {
00132         typedef typename block_type::value_type type;
00133         typedef typename block_type::bid_type bid_type;
00134         STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs nruns=" << nruns << " m=" << _m);
00135 
00136         int_type m2 = _m / 2;
00137         block_manager * bm = block_manager::get_instance();
00138         block_type * Blocks1 = new block_type[m2];
00139         block_type * Blocks2 = new block_type[m2];
00140         request_ptr * read_reqs1 = new request_ptr[m2];
00141         request_ptr * read_reqs2 = new request_ptr[m2];
00142         request_ptr * write_reqs = new request_ptr[m2];
00143         bid_type * bids = new bid_type[m2];
00144         write_completion_handler1<block_type, bid_type> * next_run_reads =
00145             new write_completion_handler1<block_type, bid_type>[m2];
00146         run_type * run;
00147 
00148         disk_queues::get_instance()->set_priority_op(disk_queue::WRITE);
00149 
00150         int_type i;
00151         int_type k = 0;
00152         int_type run_size = 0, next_run_size = 0;
00153 
00154         assert(nruns >= 2);
00155 
00156         run = runs[0];
00157         run_size = run->size();
00158         assert(run_size == m2);
00159         for (i = 0; i < run_size; ++i)
00160         {
00161             STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs posting read " << long(Blocks1[i].elem));
00162             bids[i] = *(it++);
00163             read_reqs1[i] = Blocks1[i].read(bids[i]);
00164         }
00165 
00166         for (i = 0; i < run_size; ++i)
00167             bm->delete_block(bids[i]);
00168 
00169 
00170         run_size = runs[1]->size();
00171 
00172         for (i = 0; i < run_size; ++i)
00173         {
00174             STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs posting read " << long(Blocks2[i].elem));
00175             bids[i] = *(it++);
00176             read_reqs2[i] = Blocks2[i].read(bids[i]);
00177         }
00178 
00179         for (i = 0; i < run_size; ++i)
00180             bm->delete_block(bids[i]);
00181 
00182 
00183         for (k = 0; k < nruns - 1; ++k)
00184         {
00185             run = runs[k];
00186             run_size = run->size();
00187             assert(run_size == m2);
00188             next_run_size = runs[k + 1]->size();
00189             assert((next_run_size == m2) || (next_run_size <= m2 && k == nruns - 2));
00190 
00191 
00192             STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs start waiting read_reqs1");
00193             wait_all(read_reqs1, run_size);
00194             STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs finish waiting read_reqs1");
00195 
00196             if (block_type::has_filler)
00197                 std::sort(
00198                     ArrayOfSequencesIterator<
00199                         block_type, typename block_type::value_type, block_type::size
00200                         >(Blocks1, 0),
00201                     ArrayOfSequencesIterator<
00202                         block_type, typename block_type::value_type, block_type::size
00203                         >(Blocks1, run_size * block_type::size),
00204                     cmp);
00205             else
00206                 std::sort(Blocks1[0].elem, Blocks1[run_size].elem, cmp);
00207 
00208 
00209             STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs start waiting write_reqs");
00210             if (k)
00211                 wait_all(write_reqs, m2);
00212 
00213             STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs finish waiting write_reqs");
00214 
00215             if (k == nruns - 2)
00216             {
00217                 // do not need to post read of run k+1
00218                 for (i = 0; i < m2; ++i)
00219                 {
00220                     STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs posting write " << long(Blocks1[i].elem));
00221                     (*run)[i].value = Blocks1[i][0];
00222                     write_reqs[i] = Blocks1[i].write((*run)[i].bid);
00223                 }
00224             }
00225             else
00226             {
00227                 // do need to post read of run k+1
00228                 int_type runplus2size = runs[k + 2]->size();
00229                 for (i = 0; i < m2; ++i)
00230                 {
00231                     STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs posting write " << long(Blocks1[i].elem));
00232                     (*run)[i].value = Blocks1[i][0];
00233                     if (i >= runplus2size)
00234                         write_reqs[i] = Blocks1[i].write((*run)[i].bid);
00235 
00236                     else
00237                     {
00238                         next_run_reads[i].block = Blocks1 + i;
00239                         next_run_reads[i].req = read_reqs1 + i;
00240                         bm->delete_block(next_run_reads[i].bid = *(it++));
00241                         write_reqs[i] = Blocks1[i].write((*run)[i].bid, next_run_reads[i]);
00242                     }
00243                 }
00244             }
00245             std::swap(Blocks1, Blocks2);
00246             std::swap(read_reqs1, read_reqs2);
00247         }
00248 
00249         run = runs[k];
00250         run_size = run->size();
00251         STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs start waiting read_reqs1");
00252         wait_all(read_reqs1, run_size);
00253         STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs finish waiting read_reqs1");
00254 
00255         if (block_type::has_filler) {
00256             std::sort(
00257                 ArrayOfSequencesIterator<
00258                     block_type, typename block_type::value_type, block_type::size
00259                     >(Blocks1, 0),
00260                 ArrayOfSequencesIterator<
00261                     block_type, typename block_type::value_type, block_type::size
00262                     >(Blocks1, run_size * block_type::size),
00263                 cmp);
00264         } else {
00265             std::sort(Blocks1[0].elem, Blocks1[run_size].elem, cmp);
00266         }
00267 
00268         STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs start waiting write_reqs");
00269         wait_all(write_reqs, m2);
00270         STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs finish waiting write_reqs");
00271 
00272         for (i = 0; i < run_size; ++i)
00273         {
00274             STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs posting write " << long(Blocks1[i].elem));
00275             (*run)[i].value = Blocks1[i][0];
00276             write_reqs[i] = Blocks1[i].write((*run)[i].bid);
00277         }
00278 
00279         STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs start waiting write_reqs");
00280         wait_all(write_reqs, run_size);
00281         STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::create_runs finish waiting write_reqs");
00282 
00283         delete[] Blocks1;
00284         delete[] Blocks2;
00285         delete[] read_reqs1;
00286         delete[] read_reqs2;
00287         delete[] write_reqs;
00288         delete[] bids;
00289         delete[] next_run_reads;
00290     }
00291 
00292 
00293     template <typename block_type, typename run_type, typename value_cmp>
00294     bool check_sorted_runs(run_type ** runs,
00295                            unsigned_type nruns,
00296                            unsigned_type m,
00297                            value_cmp cmp)
00298     {
00299         typedef typename block_type::value_type value_type;
00300 
00301         //STXXL_VERBOSE1("check_sorted_runs  Runs: "<<nruns);
00302         STXXL_MSG("check_sorted_runs  Runs: " << nruns);
00303         unsigned_type irun = 0;
00304         for (irun = 0; irun < nruns; ++irun)
00305         {
00306             const unsigned_type nblocks_per_run = runs[irun]->size();
00307             unsigned_type blocks_left = nblocks_per_run;
00308             block_type * blocks = new block_type[m];
00309             request_ptr * reqs = new request_ptr[m];
00310             value_type last = cmp.min_value();
00311 
00312             for (unsigned_type off = 0; off < nblocks_per_run; off += m)
00313             {
00314                 const unsigned_type nblocks = STXXL_MIN(blocks_left, m);
00315                 const unsigned_type nelements = nblocks * block_type::size;
00316                 blocks_left -= nblocks;
00317 
00318                 for (unsigned_type j = 0; j < nblocks; ++j)
00319                 {
00320                     reqs[j] = blocks[j].read((*runs[irun])[j + off].bid);
00321                 }
00322                 wait_all(reqs, reqs + nblocks);
00323 
00324                 if (off && cmp(blocks[0][0], last))
00325                 {
00326                     STXXL_MSG("check_sorted_runs  wrong first value in the run " << irun);
00327                     STXXL_MSG(" first value: " << blocks[0][0]);
00328                     STXXL_MSG(" last  value: " << last);
00329                     for (unsigned_type k = 0; k < block_type::size; ++k)
00330                         STXXL_MSG("Element " << k << " in the block is :" << blocks[0][k]);
00331 
00332                     return false;
00333                 }
00334 
00335                 for (unsigned_type j = 0; j < nblocks; ++j)
00336                 {
00337                     if (!(blocks[j][0] == (*runs[irun])[j + off].value))
00338                     {
00339                         STXXL_MSG("check_sorted_runs  wrong trigger in the run " << irun << " block " << (j + off));
00340                         STXXL_MSG("                   trigger value: " << (*runs[irun])[j + off].value);
00341                         STXXL_MSG("Data in the block:");
00342                         for (unsigned_type k = 0; k < block_type::size; ++k)
00343                             STXXL_MSG("Element " << k << " in the block is :" << blocks[j][k]);
00344 
00345                         STXXL_MSG("BIDS:");
00346                         for (unsigned_type k = 0; k < nblocks; ++k)
00347                         {
00348                             if (k == j)
00349                                 STXXL_MSG("Bad one comes next.");
00350                             STXXL_MSG("BID " << (k + off) << " is: " << ((*runs[irun])[k + off].bid));
00351                         }
00352 
00353                         return false;
00354                     }
00355                 }
00356                 if (!stxxl::is_sorted(
00357                         ArrayOfSequencesIterator<
00358                             block_type, typename block_type::value_type, block_type::size
00359                             >(blocks, 0),
00360                         ArrayOfSequencesIterator<
00361                             block_type, typename block_type::value_type, block_type::size
00362                             >(blocks, nelements),
00363                         cmp))
00364                 {
00365                     STXXL_MSG("check_sorted_runs  wrong order in the run " << irun);
00366                     STXXL_MSG("Data in blocks:");
00367                     for (unsigned_type j = 0; j < nblocks; ++j)
00368                     {
00369                         for (unsigned_type k = 0; k < block_type::size; ++k)
00370                             STXXL_MSG("     Element " << k << " in block " << (j + off) << " is :" << blocks[j][k]);
00371                     }
00372                     STXXL_MSG("BIDS:");
00373                     for (unsigned_type k = 0; k < nblocks; ++k)
00374                     {
00375                         STXXL_MSG("BID " << (k + off) << " is: " << ((*runs[irun])[k + off].bid));
00376                     }
00377 
00378                     return false;
00379                 }
00380 
00381                 last = blocks[nblocks - 1][block_type::size - 1];
00382             }
00383 
00384             assert(blocks_left == 0);
00385             delete[] reqs;
00386             delete[] blocks;
00387         }
00388 
00389         return true;
00390     }
00391 
00392 
00393     template <typename block_type, typename run_type, typename value_cmp>
00394     void merge_runs(run_type ** in_runs, int_type nruns, run_type * out_run, unsigned_type _m, value_cmp cmp
00395                     )
00396     {
00397         typedef typename block_type::bid_type bid_type;
00398         typedef typename block_type::value_type value_type;
00399         typedef block_prefetcher<block_type, typename run_type::iterator> prefetcher_type;
00400         typedef run_cursor2<block_type, prefetcher_type> run_cursor_type;
00401         typedef run_cursor2_cmp<block_type, prefetcher_type, value_cmp> run_cursor2_cmp_type;
00402 
00403         int_type i;
00404         run_type consume_seq(out_run->size());
00405 
00406         int_type * prefetch_seq = new int_type[out_run->size()];
00407 
00408         typename run_type::iterator copy_start = consume_seq.begin();
00409         for (i = 0; i < nruns; i++)
00410         {
00411             // TODO: try to avoid copy
00412             copy_start = std::copy(
00413                 in_runs[i]->begin(),
00414                 in_runs[i]->end(),
00415                 copy_start);
00416         }
00417 
00418         std::stable_sort(consume_seq.begin(), consume_seq.end(),
00419                          trigger_entry_cmp<bid_type, value_type, value_cmp>(cmp));
00420 
00421         int_type disks_number = config::get_instance()->disks_number();
00422 
00423 #ifdef PLAY_WITH_OPT_PREF
00424         const int_type n_write_buffers = 4 * disks_number;
00425 #else
00426         const int_type n_prefetch_buffers = STXXL_MAX(2 * disks_number, (3 * (int_type(_m) - nruns) / 4));
00427         const int_type n_write_buffers = STXXL_MAX(2 * disks_number, int_type(_m) - nruns - n_prefetch_buffers);
00428  #ifdef SORT_OPTIMAL_PREFETCHING
00429         // heuristic
00430         const int_type n_opt_prefetch_buffers = 2 * disks_number + (3 * (n_prefetch_buffers - 2 * disks_number)) / 10;
00431  #endif
00432 #endif
00433 
00434 #ifdef SORT_OPTIMAL_PREFETCHING
00435         compute_prefetch_schedule(
00436             consume_seq,
00437             prefetch_seq,
00438             n_opt_prefetch_buffers,
00439             disks_number);
00440 #else
00441         for (i = 0; i < out_run->size(); i++)
00442             prefetch_seq[i] = i;
00443 
00444 #endif
00445 
00446         prefetcher_type prefetcher(consume_seq.begin(),
00447                                    consume_seq.end(),
00448                                    prefetch_seq,
00449                                    nruns + n_prefetch_buffers);
00450 
00451         buffered_writer<block_type> writer(n_write_buffers, n_write_buffers / 2);
00452 
00453         int_type out_run_size = out_run->size();
00454 
00455         block_type * out_buffer = writer.get_free_block();
00456 
00457 //If parallelism is activated, one can still fall back to the
00458 //native merge routine by setting stxxl::SETTINGS::native_merge= true, //otherwise, it is used anyway.
00459 
00460 #if defined (__MCSTL__) && defined (STXXL_PARALLEL_MULTIWAY_MERGE)
00461 
00462 // begin of STL-style merging
00463 
00464         //taks: merge
00465 
00466         if (!stxxl::SETTINGS::native_merge && mcstl::HEURISTIC::num_threads >= 1)
00467         {
00468             typedef stxxl::int64 diff_type;
00469             typedef std::pair<typename block_type::iterator, typename block_type::iterator> sequence;
00470             typedef typename std::vector<sequence>::size_type seqs_size_type;
00471             std::vector<sequence> seqs(nruns);
00472             std::vector<block_type *> buffers(nruns);
00473 
00474             for (int_type i = 0; i < nruns; i++)                //initialize sequences
00475             {
00476                 buffers[i] = prefetcher.pull_block();           //get first block of each run
00477                 seqs[i] = std::make_pair(buffers[i]->begin(), buffers[i]->end());
00478                 //this memory location stays the same, only the data is exchanged
00479             }
00480 
00481  #ifdef STXXL_CHECK_ORDER_IN_SORTS
00482             value_type last_elem;
00483  #endif
00484 
00485             for (int_type j = 0; j < out_run_size; ++j)                 //for the whole output run, out_run_size is in blocks
00486             {
00487                 diff_type rest = block_type::size;                      //elements still to merge for this output block
00488 
00489                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("output block " << j);
00490                 do {
00491                     value_type * min_last_element = NULL;               //no element found yet
00492                     diff_type total_size = 0;
00493 
00494                     for (seqs_size_type i = 0; i < seqs.size(); i++)
00495                     {
00496                         if (seqs[i].first == seqs[i].second)
00497                             continue; //run empty
00498 
00499                         if (min_last_element == NULL)
00500                             min_last_element = &(*(seqs[i].second - 1));
00501                         else
00502                             min_last_element = cmp(*min_last_element, *(seqs[i].second - 1)) ? min_last_element : &(*(seqs[i].second - 1));
00503 
00504                         total_size += seqs[i].second - seqs[i].first;
00505                         STXXL_VERBOSE1("last " << *(seqs[i].second - 1) << " block size " << (seqs[i].second - seqs[i].first));
00506                     }
00507 
00508                     assert(min_last_element != NULL);           //there must be some element
00509 
00510                     STXXL_VERBOSE1("min_last_element " << min_last_element << " total size " << total_size + (block_type::size - rest));
00511 
00512                     diff_type less_equal_than_min_last = 0;
00513                     //locate this element in all sequences
00514                     for (seqs_size_type i = 0; i < seqs.size(); i++)
00515                     {
00516                         if (seqs[i].first == seqs[i].second)
00517                             continue; //empty subsequence
00518 
00519                         typename block_type::iterator position = std::upper_bound(seqs[i].first, seqs[i].second, *min_last_element, cmp);
00520                         STXXL_VERBOSE1("greater equal than " << position - seqs[i].first);
00521                         less_equal_than_min_last += position - seqs[i].first;
00522                     }
00523 
00524                     STXXL_VERBOSE1("finished loop");
00525 
00526                     ptrdiff_t output_size = (std::min)(less_equal_than_min_last, rest);         //at most rest elements
00527 
00528                     STXXL_VERBOSE1("before merge" << output_size);
00529 
00530                     mcstl::multiway_merge(seqs.begin(), seqs.end(), out_buffer->end() - rest, cmp, output_size, false);
00531                     //sequence iterators are progressed appropriately
00532 
00533                     STXXL_VERBOSE1("after merge");
00534 
00535                     (*out_run)[j].value = (*out_buffer)[0];                     //save smallest value
00536 
00537                     rest -= output_size;
00538 
00539                     STXXL_VERBOSE1("so long");
00540 
00541                     for (seqs_size_type i = 0; i < seqs.size(); i++)
00542                     {
00543                         if (seqs[i].first == seqs[i].second)                                    //run empty
00544                         {
00545                             if (prefetcher.block_consumed(buffers[i]))
00546                             {
00547                                 seqs[i].first = buffers[i]->begin();                            //reset iterator
00548                                 seqs[i].second = buffers[i]->end();
00549                                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("block ran empty " << i);
00550                             }
00551                             else
00552                             {
00553                                 seqs.erase(seqs.begin() + i);                                   //remove this sequence
00554                                 buffers.erase(buffers.begin() + i);
00555                                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("seq removed " << i);
00556                             }
00557                         }
00558                     }
00559                 } while (rest > 0 && seqs.size() > 0);
00560 
00561  #ifdef STXXL_CHECK_ORDER_IN_SORTS
00562                 if (!stxxl::is_sorted(out_buffer->begin(), out_buffer->end(), cmp))
00563                 {
00564                     for (value_type * i = out_buffer->begin() + 1; i != out_buffer->end(); i++)
00565                         if (cmp(*i, *(i - 1)))
00566                         {
00567                             STXXL_VERBOSE1("Error at position " << (i - out_buffer->begin()));
00568                         }
00569                     assert(false);
00570                 }
00571 
00572                 if (j > 0) //do not check in first iteration
00573                     assert(cmp((*out_buffer)[0], last_elem) == false);
00574 
00575 
00576                 last_elem = (*out_buffer)[block_type::size - 1];
00577  #endif
00578 
00579 
00580                 out_buffer = writer.write(out_buffer, (*out_run)[j].bid);
00581             }
00582 
00583 // end of STL-style merging
00584         }
00585         else
00586         {
00587 #endif
00588 
00589 // begin of native merging procedure
00590 
00591         loser_tree<run_cursor_type, run_cursor2_cmp_type, block_type::size>
00592         losers(&prefetcher, nruns, run_cursor2_cmp_type(cmp));
00593 
00594 #ifdef STXXL_CHECK_ORDER_IN_SORTS
00595         value_type last_elem = cmp.min_value();
00596 #endif
00597 
00598         for (i = 0; i < out_run_size; ++i)
00599         {
00600             losers.multi_merge(out_buffer->elem);
00601             (*out_run)[i].value = *(out_buffer->elem);
00602 
00603 #ifdef STXXL_CHECK_ORDER_IN_SORTS
00604             assert(stxxl::is_sorted(
00605                        out_buffer->begin(),
00606                        out_buffer->end(),
00607                        cmp));
00608 
00609             if (i)
00610                 assert(cmp(*(out_buffer->elem), last_elem) == false);
00611 
00612 
00613             last_elem = (*out_buffer).elem[block_type::size - 1];
00614 #endif
00615 
00616 
00617             out_buffer = writer.write(out_buffer, (*out_run)[i].bid);
00618         }
00619 
00620 // end of native merging procedure
00621 
00622 #if defined (__MCSTL__) && defined (STXXL_PARALLEL_MULTIWAY_MERGE)
00623     }
00624 #endif
00625 
00626 
00627         delete[] prefetch_seq;
00628 
00629         block_manager * bm = block_manager::get_instance();
00630         for (i = 0; i < nruns; ++i)
00631         {
00632             unsigned_type sz = in_runs[i]->size();
00633             for (unsigned_type j = 0; j < sz; ++j)
00634                 bm->delete_block((*in_runs[i])[j].bid);
00635 
00636 
00637             delete in_runs[i];
00638         }
00639     }
00640 
00641 
00642     template <typename block_type,
00643               typename alloc_strategy,
00644               typename input_bid_iterator,
00645               typename value_cmp>
00646     simple_vector<trigger_entry<typename block_type::bid_type, typename block_type::value_type> > *
00647     sort_blocks(input_bid_iterator input_bids,
00648                 unsigned_type _n,
00649                 unsigned_type _m,
00650                 value_cmp cmp
00651                 )
00652     {
00653         typedef typename block_type::value_type type;
00654         typedef typename block_type::bid_type bid_type;
00655         typedef trigger_entry<bid_type, type> trigger_entry_type;
00656         typedef simple_vector<trigger_entry_type> run_type;
00657         typedef typename interleaved_alloc_traits<alloc_strategy>::strategy interleaved_alloc_strategy;
00658 
00659         unsigned_type m2 = _m / 2;
00660         unsigned_type full_runs = _n / m2;
00661         unsigned_type partial_runs = ((_n % m2) ? 1 : 0);
00662         unsigned_type nruns = full_runs + partial_runs;
00663         unsigned_type i;
00664 
00665         config * cfg = config::get_instance();
00666         block_manager * mng = block_manager::get_instance();
00667         const unsigned_type ndisks = cfg->disks_number();
00668 
00669         //STXXL_VERBOSE ("n=" << _n << " nruns=" << nruns << "=" << full_runs << "+" << partial_runs);
00670 
00671 #if STXXL_IO_STATS
00672         stats * iostats = stats::get_instance();
00673         iostats += 0;
00674         // iostats->reset();
00675 #endif
00676 
00677         double begin = stxxl_timestamp(), after_runs_creation, end;
00678 
00679         run_type ** runs = new run_type *[nruns];
00680 
00681         for (i = 0; i < full_runs; i++)
00682             runs[i] = new run_type(m2);
00683 
00684 
00685         if (partial_runs)
00686             runs[i] = new run_type(_n - full_runs * m2);
00687 
00688 
00689         for (i = 0; i < nruns; ++i)
00690         {
00691             // FIXME: why has an alloc_strategy to take two arguments disk_index.begin(), disk_index.end() ???
00692             mng->new_blocks(alloc_strategy(0, ndisks),
00693                             trigger_entry_iterator<typename run_type::iterator, block_type::raw_size>(runs[i]->begin()),
00694                             trigger_entry_iterator<typename run_type::iterator, block_type::raw_size>(runs[i]->end()));
00695         }
00696 
00697         sort_local::create_runs<block_type,
00698                                 run_type,
00699                                 input_bid_iterator,
00700                                 value_cmp>(input_bids, runs, nruns, _m, cmp);
00701 
00702         after_runs_creation = stxxl_timestamp();
00703 
00704 #ifdef COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00705         double io_wait_after_rf = stxxl::wait_time_counter;
00706         io_wait_after_rf += 0.0;
00707 #endif
00708 
00709         disk_queues::get_instance()->set_priority_op(disk_queue::WRITE);
00710 
00711         // Optimal merging: merge r = pow(nruns,1/ceil(log(nruns)/log(m))) runs at once
00712 
00713         const int_type merge_factor = static_cast<int_type>(ceil(pow(nruns, 1. / ceil(log(double(nruns)) /
00714                                                                                       log(double(_m))))));
00715         run_type ** new_runs;
00716 
00717         while (nruns > 1)
00718         {
00719             int_type new_nruns = div_and_round_up(nruns, merge_factor);
00720             STXXL_VERBOSE("Starting new merge phase: nruns: " << nruns <<
00721                           " opt_merge_factor: " << merge_factor << " m:" << _m << " new_nruns: " << new_nruns);
00722 
00723             new_runs = new run_type *[new_nruns];
00724 
00725             int_type runs_left = nruns;
00726             int_type cur_out_run = 0;
00727             int_type blocks_in_new_run = 0;
00728 
00729             while (runs_left > 0)
00730             {
00731                 int_type runs2merge = STXXL_MIN(runs_left, merge_factor);
00732                 blocks_in_new_run = 0;
00733                 for (unsigned_type i = nruns - runs_left; i < (nruns - runs_left + runs2merge); i++)
00734                     blocks_in_new_run += runs[i]->size();
00735 
00736                 // allocate run
00737                 new_runs[cur_out_run++] = new run_type(blocks_in_new_run);
00738                 runs_left -= runs2merge;
00739             }
00740             // allocate blocks for the new runs
00741             if (cur_out_run == 1 && blocks_in_new_run == int_type(_n) && (input_bids->storage->get_id() == -1))
00742             {
00743                 // if we sort a file we can reuse the input bids for the output
00744                 input_bid_iterator cur = input_bids;
00745                 for (int_type i = 0; cur != (input_bids + _n); ++cur)
00746                 {
00747                     (*new_runs[0])[i++].bid = *cur;
00748                 }
00749 
00750                 bid_type & firstBID = (*new_runs[0])[0].bid;
00751                 if (firstBID.storage->get_id() != -1)
00752                 {
00753                     // the first block does not belong to the file
00754                     // need to reallocate it
00755                     mng->new_blocks(FR(), &firstBID, (&firstBID) + 1);
00756                 }
00757                 bid_type & lastBID = (*new_runs[0])[_n - 1].bid;
00758                 if (lastBID.storage->get_id() != -1)
00759                 {
00760                     // the first block does not belong to the file
00761                     // need to reallocate it
00762                     mng->new_blocks(FR(), &lastBID, (&lastBID) + 1);
00763                 }
00764             }
00765             else
00766             {
00767                 mng->new_blocks(interleaved_alloc_strategy(new_nruns, 0, ndisks),
00768                                 RunsToBIDArrayAdaptor2<block_type::raw_size, run_type>(new_runs, 0, new_nruns, blocks_in_new_run),
00769                                 RunsToBIDArrayAdaptor2<block_type::raw_size, run_type>(new_runs, _n, new_nruns, blocks_in_new_run));
00770             }
00771             // merge all
00772             runs_left = nruns;
00773             cur_out_run = 0;
00774             while (runs_left > 0)
00775             {
00776                 int_type runs2merge = STXXL_MIN(runs_left, merge_factor);
00777 #ifdef STXXL_CHECK_ORDER_IN_SORTS
00778                 assert((check_sorted_runs<block_type, run_type, value_cmp>(runs + nruns - runs_left, runs2merge, m2, cmp)));
00779 #endif
00780                 STXXL_VERBOSE("Merging " << runs2merge << " runs");
00781                 merge_runs<block_type, run_type>(runs + nruns - runs_left,
00782                                                  runs2merge, *(new_runs + (cur_out_run++)), _m, cmp
00783                                                  );
00784                 runs_left -= runs2merge;
00785             }
00786 
00787             nruns = new_nruns;
00788             delete[] runs;
00789             runs = new_runs;
00790         }
00791 
00792         run_type * result = *runs;
00793         delete[] runs;
00794 
00795 
00796         end = stxxl_timestamp();
00797         (void)(begin);
00798 
00799         STXXL_VERBOSE("Elapsed time        : " << end - begin << " s. Run creation time: " <<
00800                       after_runs_creation - begin << " s");
00801 #if STXXL_IO_STATS
00802         STXXL_VERBOSE("reads               : " << iostats->get_reads());
00803         STXXL_VERBOSE("writes              : " << iostats->get_writes());
00804         STXXL_VERBOSE("read time           : " << iostats->get_read_time() << " s");
00805         STXXL_VERBOSE("write time          : " << iostats->get_write_time() << " s");
00806         STXXL_VERBOSE("parallel read time  : " << iostats->get_pread_time() << " s");
00807         STXXL_VERBOSE("parallel write time : " << iostats->get_pwrite_time() << " s");
00808         STXXL_VERBOSE("parallel io time    : " << iostats->get_pio_time() << " s");
00809 #endif
00810 #ifdef COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00811         STXXL_VERBOSE("Time in I/O wait(rf): " << io_wait_after_rf << " s");
00812         STXXL_VERBOSE("Time in I/O wait    : " << stxxl::wait_time_counter << " s");
00813 #endif
00814 
00815         return result;
00816     }
00817 }
00818 
00819 
00827 template <typename ExtIterator_, typename StrictWeakOrdering_>
00828 void sort(ExtIterator_ first, ExtIterator_ last, StrictWeakOrdering_ cmp, unsigned_type M)
00829 {
00830     typedef simple_vector<sort_local::trigger_entry<typename ExtIterator_::bid_type,
00831                                                     typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::value_type> > run_type;
00832 
00833     typedef typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::value_type value_type;
00834     typedef typename ExtIterator_::block_type block_type;
00835 
00836     // verify strict weak ordering of the sentinels
00837     assert(!cmp(cmp.min_value(), cmp.min_value()));
00838     assert(cmp(cmp.min_value(), cmp.max_value()));
00839     assert(!cmp(cmp.max_value(), cmp.max_value()));
00840 
00841     unsigned_type n = 0;
00842 
00843     block_manager * mng = block_manager::get_instance();
00844 
00845     first.flush();
00846 
00847     if ((last - first) * sizeof(value_type) * sort_memory_usage_factor() < M)
00848     {
00849         stl_in_memory_sort(first, last, cmp);
00850     }
00851     else
00852     {
00853         assert(2 * block_type::raw_size * sort_memory_usage_factor() <= M);
00854 
00855         if (first.block_offset())
00856         {
00857             if (last.block_offset())              // first and last element are
00858             // not the first elements of their block
00859             {
00860                 typename ExtIterator_::block_type * first_block = new typename ExtIterator_::block_type;
00861                 typename ExtIterator_::block_type * last_block = new typename ExtIterator_::block_type;
00862                 typename ExtIterator_::bid_type first_bid, last_bid;
00863                 request_ptr req;
00864 
00865                 req = first_block->read(*first.bid());
00866                 mng->new_blocks(FR(), &first_bid, (&first_bid) + 1);                // try to overlap
00867                 mng->new_blocks(FR(), &last_bid, (&last_bid) + 1);
00868                 req->wait();
00869 
00870 
00871                 req = last_block->read(*last.bid());
00872 
00873                 unsigned_type i = 0;
00874                 for ( ; i < first.block_offset(); ++i)
00875                 {
00876                     first_block->elem[i] = cmp.min_value();
00877                 }
00878 
00879                 req->wait();
00880 
00881 
00882                 req = first_block->write(first_bid);
00883                 for (i = last.block_offset(); i < block_type::size; ++i)
00884                 {
00885                     last_block->elem[i] = cmp.max_value();
00886                 }
00887 
00888                 req->wait();
00889 
00890 
00891                 req = last_block->write(last_bid);
00892 
00893                 n = last.bid() - first.bid() + 1;
00894 
00895                 std::swap(first_bid, *first.bid());
00896                 std::swap(last_bid, *last.bid());
00897 
00898                 req->wait();
00899 
00900 
00901                 delete first_block;
00902                 delete last_block;
00903 
00904                 run_type * out =
00905                     sort_local::sort_blocks<
00906                         typename ExtIterator_::block_type,
00907                         typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::alloc_strategy,
00908                         typename ExtIterator_::bids_container_iterator>
00909                     (first.bid(), n, M / sort_memory_usage_factor() / block_type::raw_size, cmp);
00910 
00911 
00912                 first_block = new typename ExtIterator_::block_type;
00913                 last_block = new typename ExtIterator_::block_type;
00914                 typename ExtIterator_::block_type * sorted_first_block = new typename ExtIterator_::block_type;
00915                 typename ExtIterator_::block_type * sorted_last_block = new typename ExtIterator_::block_type;
00916                 request_ptr * reqs = new request_ptr[2];
00917 
00918                 reqs[0] = first_block->read(first_bid);
00919                 reqs[1] = sorted_first_block->read((*(out->begin())).bid);
00920 
00921                 reqs[0]->wait();
00922                 reqs[1]->wait();
00923 
00924                 reqs[0] = last_block->read(last_bid);
00925                 reqs[1] = sorted_last_block->read(((*out)[out->size() - 1]).bid);
00926 
00927                 for (i = first.block_offset(); i < block_type::size; i++)
00928                 {
00929                     first_block->elem[i] = sorted_first_block->elem[i];
00930                 }
00931 
00932                 reqs[0]->wait();
00933                 reqs[1]->wait();
00934 
00935                 req = first_block->write(first_bid);
00936 
00937                 for (i = 0; i < last.block_offset(); ++i)
00938                 {
00939                     last_block->elem[i] = sorted_last_block->elem[i];
00940                 }
00941 
00942                 req->wait();
00943 
00944                 req = last_block->write(last_bid);
00945 
00946                 mng->delete_block(out->begin()->bid);
00947                 mng->delete_block((*out)[out->size() - 1].bid);
00948 
00949                 *first.bid() = first_bid;
00950                 *last.bid() = last_bid;
00951 
00952                 typename run_type::iterator it = out->begin();
00953                 ++it;
00954                 typename ExtIterator_::bids_container_iterator cur_bid = first.bid();
00955                 ++cur_bid;
00956 
00957                 for ( ; cur_bid != last.bid(); ++cur_bid, ++it)
00958                 {
00959                     *cur_bid = (*it).bid;
00960                 }
00961 
00962                 delete first_block;
00963                 delete sorted_first_block;
00964                 delete sorted_last_block;
00965                 delete[] reqs;
00966                 delete out;
00967 
00968                 req->wait();
00969 
00970 
00971                 delete last_block;
00972             }
00973             else
00974             {
00975                 // first element is
00976                 // not the first element of its block
00977                 typename ExtIterator_::block_type * first_block = new typename ExtIterator_::block_type;
00978                 typename ExtIterator_::bid_type first_bid;
00979                 request_ptr req;
00980 
00981                 req = first_block->read(*first.bid());
00982                 mng->new_blocks(FR(), &first_bid, (&first_bid) + 1);                // try to overlap
00983                 req->wait();
00984 
00985 
00986                 unsigned_type i = 0;
00987                 for ( ; i < first.block_offset(); ++i)
00988                 {
00989                     first_block->elem[i] = cmp.min_value();
00990                 }
00991 
00992                 req = first_block->write(first_bid);
00993 
00994                 n = last.bid() - first.bid();
00995 
00996                 std::swap(first_bid, *first.bid());
00997 
00998                 req->wait();
00999 
01000 
01001                 delete first_block;
01002 
01003                 run_type * out =
01004                     sort_local::sort_blocks<
01005                         typename ExtIterator_::block_type,
01006                         typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::alloc_strategy,
01007                         typename ExtIterator_::bids_container_iterator>
01008                     (first.bid(), n, M / sort_memory_usage_factor() / block_type::raw_size, cmp);
01009 
01010 
01011                 first_block = new typename ExtIterator_::block_type;
01012 
01013                 typename ExtIterator_::block_type * sorted_first_block = new typename ExtIterator_::block_type;
01014 
01015                 request_ptr * reqs = new request_ptr[2];
01016 
01017                 reqs[0] = first_block->read(first_bid);
01018                 reqs[1] = sorted_first_block->read((*(out->begin())).bid);
01019 
01020                 reqs[0]->wait();
01021                 reqs[1]->wait();
01022 
01023                 for (i = first.block_offset(); i < block_type::size; ++i)
01024                 {
01025                     first_block->elem[i] = sorted_first_block->elem[i];
01026                 }
01027 
01028                 req = first_block->write(first_bid);
01029 
01030                 mng->delete_block(out->begin()->bid);
01031 
01032                 *first.bid() = first_bid;
01033 
01034                 typename run_type::iterator it = out->begin();
01035                 ++it;
01036                 typename ExtIterator_::bids_container_iterator cur_bid = first.bid();
01037                 ++cur_bid;
01038 
01039                 for ( ; cur_bid != last.bid(); ++cur_bid, ++it)
01040                 {
01041                     *cur_bid = (*it).bid;
01042                 }
01043 
01044                 *cur_bid = (*it).bid;
01045 
01046                 delete sorted_first_block;
01047                 delete[] reqs;
01048                 delete out;
01049 
01050                 req->wait();
01051 
01052                 delete first_block;
01053             }
01054         }
01055         else
01056         {
01057             if (last.block_offset())            // last is
01058             // not the first element of its block
01059             {
01060                 typename ExtIterator_::block_type * last_block = new typename ExtIterator_::block_type;
01061                 typename ExtIterator_::bid_type last_bid;
01062                 request_ptr req;
01063                 unsigned_type i;
01064 
01065                 req = last_block->read(*last.bid());
01066                 mng->new_blocks(FR(), &last_bid, (&last_bid) + 1);
01067                 req->wait();
01068 
01069 
01070                 for (i = last.block_offset(); i < block_type::size; ++i)
01071                 {
01072                     last_block->elem[i] = cmp.max_value();
01073                 }
01074 
01075                 req = last_block->write(last_bid);
01076 
01077                 n = last.bid() - first.bid() + 1;
01078 
01079                 std::swap(last_bid, *last.bid());
01080 
01081                 req->wait();
01082 
01083 
01084                 delete last_block;
01085 
01086                 run_type * out =
01087                     sort_local::sort_blocks<
01088                         typename ExtIterator_::block_type,
01089                         typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::alloc_strategy,
01090                         typename ExtIterator_::bids_container_iterator>
01091                     (first.bid(), n, M / sort_memory_usage_factor() / block_type::raw_size, cmp);
01092 
01093 
01094                 last_block = new typename ExtIterator_::block_type;
01095                 typename ExtIterator_::block_type * sorted_last_block = new typename ExtIterator_::block_type;
01096                 request_ptr * reqs = new request_ptr[2];
01097 
01098                 reqs[0] = last_block->read(last_bid);
01099                 reqs[1] = sorted_last_block->read(((*out)[out->size() - 1]).bid);
01100 
01101                 reqs[0]->wait();
01102                 reqs[1]->wait();
01103 
01104                 for (i = 0; i < last.block_offset(); ++i)
01105                 {
01106                     last_block->elem[i] = sorted_last_block->elem[i];
01107                 }
01108 
01109                 req = last_block->write(last_bid);
01110 
01111                 mng->delete_block((*out)[out->size() - 1].bid);
01112 
01113                 *last.bid() = last_bid;
01114 
01115                 typename run_type::iterator it = out->begin();
01116                 typename ExtIterator_::bids_container_iterator cur_bid = first.bid();
01117 
01118                 for ( ; cur_bid != last.bid(); ++cur_bid, ++it)
01119                 {
01120                     *cur_bid = (*it).bid;
01121                 }
01122 
01123                 delete sorted_last_block;
01124                 delete[] reqs;
01125                 delete out;
01126 
01127                 req->wait();
01128 
01129                 delete last_block;
01130             }
01131             else
01132             {
01133                 // first and last element are first elements of their of blocks
01134                 n = last.bid() - first.bid();
01135 
01136                 run_type * out =
01137                     sort_local::sort_blocks<typename ExtIterator_::block_type,
01138                                             typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::alloc_strategy,
01139                                             typename ExtIterator_::bids_container_iterator>
01140                     (first.bid(), n, M / sort_memory_usage_factor() / block_type::raw_size, cmp);
01141 
01142                 typename run_type::iterator it = out->begin();
01143                 typename ExtIterator_::bids_container_iterator cur_bid = first.bid();
01144 
01145                 for ( ; cur_bid != last.bid(); ++cur_bid, ++it)
01146                 {
01147                     *cur_bid = (*it).bid;
01148                 }
01149 
01150                 delete out;
01151             }
01152         }
01153     }
01154 
01155 #ifdef STXXL_CHECK_ORDER_IN_SORTS
01156     assert(stxxl::is_sorted(first, last, cmp));
01157 #endif
01158 }
